title: CRASH
body: Since the past few patches I am constantly getting bugsplats in the middle of games or when Im in ranked champ select which leads me to lose LP and affects how I can play my lane. I dont understand if this is a problem with just me or if it's the new league of legends client, but it's been happening a lot and kind of annoying.

replies.body:
Am having game crashing since 4.16 and i thought it got fixed with the support i got from riot but started again everytime they patch. I got so many reports that i got a ban for a day. Everytime there's a patch a game crash and bug splat right with it. Plz riot fix this because all those reports i got are because of the crashing and bug splat.
{{champion:25}}
Did you get the crash report number from the bugsplat, that will help me greatly identify why you are crashing.
